products.name: Elder Wand
products.description: Made of Elder Wood, 15 inches and Thestral tail hair core.

products.name: Resurrection Stone
products.description: Able to bring back the spirits of the holder's deceased loved ones; activating when the Stone is turned three times in the user's hand.

products.name: Cloak of Invisibility
products.description: Able to conceal its wearer so absolutely, that even death itself can not find them.
products.rating: 'Perfect for bad hair days' - Harmony Cranger

products.name: White Owl
products.description: White Owl best friend that delivers letters for you.

products.name: House Elf
products.description: A house elf servant who is pleased to serve his or her master. DO NOT GIVE THEM CLOTHES. Warthogs is not responsible for any freed house elfs.
products.rating: 'Don't mention SPEW, they hate that.' - Walrick Wallenby

products.name: Barrels of Butter Beer
products.description: Two barrels of the finest Butter Beer the Three Broomsticks has to offer.

products.name: School Robes
products.description: Four pairs of an entire set of school robes.

products.name: Goblet
products.description: Goblet with the Warthogs Wizarding School crest
